short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate the price of gift cards products
short.vi: Tính giá các sản phẩm thẻ quà tặng

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Vanilla Gift Card Chrome Extension is an extension on the Chrome browser, helping users easily calculate the value of Vanilla Gift Cards and providing detailed information about the corresponding product.
Main feature:

Calculate gift card value: Users can select the desired product from the list and enter the quantity, then press the "Calculator" button to calculate the total value of the gift card based on the product and quantity given. select.

Display product information: After calculation, the application will display the value of the gift card along with a detailed description of that product, helping users better understand the content of the gift card they are buying. care about.

Area calculation: In addition to calculating gift card value, the application also provides the feature to calculate the area of a rectangle based on the length and width that the user enters.

- Address: 1422 Western Ave, Las Vegas, NV, USA
- Email: vanillagiftcard132@gmail.com
